span.title: dateTime Type: A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month). If hours and minutes are specified, a UTC offset SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored. Dates SHALL be valid dates.

description.value: EHDS refined base model for a single medication administration

short.value: Medication administration model

definition.value: EHDS refined base model for a single medication administration

short.value: Common header for all patient-related data

definition.value: Common header for all patient-related data

short.value: Patient/subject information

definition.value: Patient/subject information

short.value: Business identifier for the object, unique within its system. Supporting disambiguation between different contexts (systems/countries).

definition.value: Business identifier for the object, unique within its system. Supporting disambiguation between different contexts (systems/countries).

short.value: Resource authoring details. Multiple authors can be provided.

definition.value: Resource authoring details. Multiple authors can be provided.

short.value: Author responsible for the provided information. The exact role of the responsible author varies across use cases and is often specified in individual models.

definition.value: Author responsible for the provided information. The exact role of the responsible author varies across use cases and is often specified in individual models.

short.value: Date and time of authoring/issuing

definition.value: Date and time of authoring/issuing

short.value: Status of the administration (e.g. completed, not-done, on-hold, in-progress, unknown)

definition.value: Status of the resource or document

short.value: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

definition.value: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

short.value: Administered medication

definition.value: Administered medication

short.value: Specific date/time or interval of time during which the administration took place (or did not take place)

definition.value: Specific date/time or interval of time during which the administration took place (or did not take place)

short.value: Condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered

definition.value: Condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered

short.value: Textual information about the administration

definition.value: Textual information about the administration

short.value: Details of how medication was taken

definition.value: Details of how medication was taken

short.value: Full dosaging information as human-readable text covering all dosaging steps. Generating the text follows local rules and should include all locally implemented dosaging data even when such elements are not present in this model.

definition.value: Full dosaging information as human-readable text covering all dosaging steps. Generating the text follows local rules and should include all locally implemented dosaging data even when such elements are not present in this model.

short.value: Details of single dosaging scheme step

definition.value: Details of single dosaging scheme step

short.value: Order of the dosage instruction, in case one treatment consists of several dosaging steps. When two schemes share the same sequence number, they are meant to be running in parallel.

definition.value: Order of the dosage instruction, in case one treatment consists of several dosaging steps. When two schemes share the same sequence number, they are meant to be running in parallel.

short.value: Patient oriented instructions as free text for this dosaging step

definition.value: Patient oriented instructions as free text for this dosaging step

short.value: Amount of medication administered per one dose (= one timing)

definition.value: Amount of medication administered per one dose (= one timing)

short.value: Amount of medication per one dose. (1 tablet, 2-3 tablets, 20ml)

definition.value: Amount of medication per one dose. (1 tablet, 2-3 tablets, 20ml)

description.value: UCUM (units of measurement), EDQM Standard Terms (units of presentation)

short.value: Amount of medication per time period (e.g. 100mg per 1 hour). When rate is provided per 1 time unit, Quantity data type can be used with a suitable unit (e.g. mg/h, ug/min).

definition.value: Amount of medication per time period (e.g. 100mg per 1 hour). When rate is provided per 1 time unit, Quantity data type can be used with a suitable unit (e.g. mg/h, ug/min).

description.value: UCUM (units of measurement), EDQM Standard Terms (units of presentation)

short.value: Repetition of the administration.

definition.value: Repetition of the administration.

short.value: Time bounds for the treatment (current dosaging scheme). Only one of the following can exist.

definition.value: Time bounds for the treatment (current dosaging scheme). Only one of the following can exist.

short.value: Number of time units, e.g 10 days

definition.value: Number of time units, e.g 10 days

short.value: Start and end date, 05.08.2023 - 10.08.2023

definition.value: Start and end date, 05.08.2023 - 10.08.2023

short.value: Duration of administration (e.g '5 minutes', '1 hour')

definition.value: Duration of administration (e.g '5 minutes', '1 hour')

short.value: Frequency of intake/administration (e.g 'three times a day')

definition.value: Frequency of intake/administration (e.g 'three times a day')

short.value: Number of times per period (e.g '3 times')

definition.value: Number of times per period (e.g '3 times')

short.value: Duration to which the frequency applies (e.g '... / 1 day')

definition.value: Duration to which the frequency applies (e.g '... / 1 day')

short.value: The day of the week of administration, e.g Mon, Tue, etc

definition.value: The day of the week of administration, e.g Mon, Tue, etc

short.value: Exact time of day of administration (e.g '10:00')

definition.value: Exact time of day of administration (e.g '10:00')

short.value: Time period or event when the administration should happen ('before meal', 'immediately', 'morning')

definition.value: Time period or event when the administration should happen ('before meal', 'immediately', 'morning')

short.value: Take as needed

definition.value: Take as needed

short.value: Body site of administration

definition.value: Body site of administration

short.value: Route of administration

definition.value: Route of administration

definition.value: EHDS refined base model for a single medication administration
